p: KMO was obtained according to the method used by Jumbri et al. 11 Virgin coconut oil (VCO, from Cocos nucifera), soybean oil (SO), safflower seed oil (SSO), castor oil (CO), xanthan gum (from Xanthomonas campestris), and potassium sorbate were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (St Louis, MO, USA). Palm kernel oil ester (PKOE) was obtained according to the method used by Keng et al. 12 Lemon essential oil (LO) South African was purchased from Wellness Original Ingredient (Puchong, Malaysia), whereas polyoxyethylene sorbitan monooleate and Tween 80 (hydrophileâ€“lipophile balance [HLB] 15.0) were purchased from EMD Millipore (Billerica, MA, USA). Deionized water was purified using a Milli-Q water system (EMD Millipore). The 3T3 cell lines (from mouse embryonic fibroblast cells) were purchased commercially from American Type Culture Collection (Manassas, VA, USA). Chemicals used were all analytical, food, or cosmetic grade classes.
